item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Read our full 2025 State of Rollups Report here for more analysis. https://www.conduit.xyz/blog/2025-state-of-rollups/
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: Read our full 2025 State of Rollups Report here for more analysis. conduit.xyz/blog/2025-state-…

item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
Use cases matter here.

@base L3s lead in onchain social and AI.

@Arbitrum L3s lead in gaming and infra.

DEX, ecosystem, NFT, and payments-focused chains are mostly running as L2s.

What will these numbers look like a year from now?

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: L2s vs. L3s:
Across the whole rollup ecosystem, 3/4ths of rollups are L2s settling on Ethereum.
But in the Conduit ecosystem, nearly half of all rollups are L3s, with most of those settling on @arbitrum One and a healthy share settling on @base.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
L2s vs. L3s:

Across the whole rollup ecosystem, 3/4ths of rollups are L2s settling on Ethereum.

But in the Conduit ecosystem, nearly half of all rollups are L3s, with most of those settling on @arbitrum One and a healthy share settling on @base.

item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
DA choices vary by use case.

@arbitrum AnyTrust is big with gaming, infra, and ecosystem rollups.

@Celestia is big with AI, onchain social, DEXs, and payments rollups.

Both are duking it out with @eigen_da in web3 consumer – a category we expect to grow in 2025.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: DA:
Across the whole ecosystem, Ethereum is the 1st choice for DA, followed by custom solutions.
But on Conduit, Ethereum is 3rd. @arbitrum AnyTrust is 1st, followed closely by @Celestia.
Takeaway: Conduit rollups embrace alt-DA because they need ultra-high throughput.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
DA:

Across the whole ecosystem, Ethereum is the 1st choice for DA, followed by custom solutions.

But on Conduit, Ethereum is 3rd. @arbitrum AnyTrust is 1st, followed closely by @Celestia.

Takeaway: Conduit rollups embrace alt-DA because they need ultra-high throughput.

item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
But these numbers vary dramatically by rollup use case.

@Optimism OP Stack leads for AI, NFTs, payments, and social.

@arbitrum Orbit leads for gaming and infra.

item.title:
Which rollup frameworks, DA layers, and settlement layers are rollups using? We have data for the full ecosystem as measured by @l2beat and Conduit rollups specifically.
Let’s start with frameworks: @Optimism OP Stack and @arbitrum Orbit are neck and neck, with OP just ahead.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz

item.title:
We're excited to put another event on Conduit's ETHDenver calendar: Mile High DomainFi, co-hosted with @D3inc!
Join us Wednesday, Feb 26 at 5:30pm for an evening of drinks and discussion on web domain tokenization, RWA infra, and more.

item.title:

Coin it. Trade it. Discover the value of your posts.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: There’s no easier way to integrate NFTScan than on Conduit Marketplace.
Plug it in and watch your chain instantly get 100x more NFT-friendly. https://www.conduit.xyz/marketplace
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
There’s no easier way to integrate NFTScan than on Conduit Marketplace.

Plug it in and watch your chain instantly get 100x more NFT-friendly. conduit.xyz/marketplace

item.title: R to @conduitxyz: Your chain’s NFT data also goes into the NFTScan API. That allows the thousands of developers on the NFTScan platform to query the data and build better NFT experiences on your chain – better wallets, better NFT marketplaces, better SocialFi apps, and more.
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description: Your chain’s NFT data also goes into the NFTScan API. That allows the thousands of developers on the NFTScan platform to query the data and build better NFT experiences on your chain – better wallets, better NFT marketplaces, better SocialFi apps, and more.

item.title:
R to @conduitxyz: What do you get with NFTScan?
For one, you get a dedicated, public NFT explorer for your chain.
Users can see which collections, marketplaces, and mints are doing the biggest numbers on your rollup.
What better way to build excitement for your chain’s NFT ecosystem?
item.dc:creator: @conduitxyz
item.description:
